name: Neozep
description: Used for the relief of clogged nose, runny nose, postnasal drip, itchy and watery eyes

name: Alaxan
description: Used for the relief of mild to moderately severe pain of muscoskeletal origin such as muscle pain (myalgia), arthritis, rheumatism, sprain and strain

name: Amoxil
description: It is used to treat bacterial infections, such as chest infections (including pneumonia) and dental abscesses
